name: VectorDB
instructions: MCP Server - Vector DB Model Context Protocol Server Implementation

put_doc.name: put_doc
put_doc.description: Save the given text with document type and desk categorization so it can later be recovered by semantic search. Parameters: document (required), document_type (optional: news, research, message, trade, general), desk (optional: trading desk identifier).

annotations.title: Save the given text with document type and desk categorization so it can later be recovered by semantic search.

get_related_docs.name: get_related_docs
get_related_docs.description: Given a text fragment, search for related documents, updates, news, events etc of any type

annotations.title: Given a text fragment, search for related documents, updates, news, events etc of any type
